name: debrief
description: Object serialization and annotation, for use in human-friendly error messages

0.0.1.name: debrief
0.0.1.description: Object serialization and annotation, for use in human-friendly error messages

scripts.build: yarn run build:clean && yarn run build:lib && yarn run build:flow
scripts.check: yarn run check:eslint && yarn run check:prettier && yarn run check:import-sort
scripts.fix: yarn run fix:prettier && yarn run fix:import-sort
scripts.prepublish: yarn run --silent in-publish && yarn run actually-prepublish || echo
scripts.actually-prepublish: yarn run build:clean && yarn run test && yarn run build
scripts.test: yarn run test:flow && yarn run test:jest && yarn run check

readme:
[![npm](https://img.shields.io/npm/v/debrief.svg)](https://www.npmjs.com/package/debrief)
[![Build Status](https://img.shields.io/travis/nvie/debrief.js/master.svg)](https://travis-ci.org/nvie/debrief.js)
[![Coverage Status](https://img.shields.io/coveralls/nvie/debrief.js/master.svg)](https://coveralls.io/github/nvie/debrief.js?branch=master)

Debrief, a library for serializing and annotating JavaScript objects for human
friendly error output.
